title: Independent Study
description: Independent study designated for Seventh College students who wish to carry out a project they begin in previous synthesis program courses. Prerequisites: completion of SYN 100, restricted to upper-division Seventh College students only, must be taken P/NP only, can be taken up to two times for credit, must complete at least ninety units with a 2.5 GPA in upper-division undergraduate courses at UC San Diego, department approval is required, enrollment satisfies the Seventh College high-impact requirement.
